abstract: Andrew Smulian, testifying for second day in trial of accused arms dealer Viktor Bout,  details plan under which Bout and he would have sold weapons to the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.
snippet: In his second day of testimony in Viktor Bout’s trial, Andrew Smulian detailed a plan in which he said they would have sold weapons to the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.
lead_paragraph: In his second day of testimony in Viktor Bout’s trial, Andrew Smulian detailed a plan in which he said they would have sold weapons to the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia.

headline.main: Telling Court of a Scheme to Sell Arms to Terrorists
headline.print_headline: Telling Court Of a Scheme To Sell Arms To Terrorists
headline.seo: Ex-Associate Testifies Viktor Bout Planned to Sell Arms to FARC
